Author: Aleksandr_Shelepaev
Title: [ANN] INVESTY - TRADING SOCIAL NETWORK
Body: Implemented platform functionality:  1. Creation of a demo portfolio: The user can create a "virtual" portfolio for an user-defined amount and rebalance it (rebalancing is the process of distributing the share of the cryptocurrency in a portfolio) and also monitor the portfolio's profitability.  2. Connecting a stock exchange account with a portfolio: the user can connect his stock account with the portfolio on the platform via API. All rebalancing made with a portfolio through the Investy interface will also take place on the stock exchange account.  3. Public portfolio: the user can make his portfolio public and set the price of a monthly subscription to his portfolio, thereby earning income.  4. Subscription to the public portfolio: the user can see the results of portfolio management on the marketplace and subscribe for the auto following. Auto following – it is when the user connectss his exchange account through the API to the public portfolio he likes, specifying the amount in what the portfolio is going to be copied. After that, the specified amount on its exchange account will be automatically distributed according to the shares of various cryptocurrencies in the portfolio. Further, after each public portfolio rebalancing by a trader, changes on the exchange account of the copying user will be made (purchase / sale). Also, the user will receive web notifications and e-mail notifications about the changes.   What is planned to implement:  1. Adding new exchanges to the marketplace of the Investy platform.  2. Indices: in fact, the index is a portfolio with tough parameters. For example, top 10 cryptocurrencies in terms of capitalization, this means that if some currency leaves the top 10, then it is sold, and the new one is purchased. The user also connects his stock exchange account to the index. The emphasis is on passive investors.  3. EasyTrade: a section for working with connected exchange accounts in the mode of transactions. Unlike portfolio management, it is a tool for short-medium-term trading. The following functionality will be available: Stop Loss, Take profit, Trailing Take Profit, Trailing Stop Loss and other tools for convenience of trading, and risk management.  4. Easycopy: by analogy with portfolio copying, a user can subscribe for copying of transactions of a public trader, connect a stock exchange account in a certain amount and copy his transactions, as well as subscribe to several traders at once. Unlike portfolio copying, payment is not charged for a monthly subscription, but according to the success fee system, which means that after each successful transaction, a user shares the profit with a trader and the system (about 30 percent of the profit), for this, the system will be added the user's internal balance, from which the service fee will be charged.  5. Trading bots: the marketplace of trading algorithms, to which a user can attach his stock exchange account. Unlike people, bots work around the clock with the same algorithms. Payment is made in the form of a monthly subscription for using the bot or success fee. Bots are developed by us.  6. Open API: it allows other developers to create their own trading algorithms, put them to the system and earn when others use them.  7. Various non-fundamental developments and plans: we will describe them in the order they are released on the platform.

Author: Aleksandr_Shelepaev
Title: [ANN] INVESTY - TRADING SOCIAL NETWORK
Body: Hello ladies and gentlemen! You have been waiting for this for so long, and we are ready to tell you how the Investy ITO went!    The Initial Token Offering (ITO) ended on December 23, 2017 and so did the bounty campaign!  To see our smart contract, please visit  The maximum number of tokens that were supposed to be issued: 349 308 401 according to the smart contract. Here it is, by the way, for those who like to check everything.  A total of 45,511,972 tokens (almost 46 million) were issued, which was 7.6 times less than the maximum, again you can check it here  Important note: IVC tokens will not be issued anymore and in due course their number will decrease, which will favorably affect the growth of their value. We are also planning to spend part of the profit for buying up tokens to make them expired! So you understand how this will affect the price of the token  Where will the collected tokens go? Let's see what we have written in the WP, here it is   So, out of all the number of tokens issued, i.e. 45,911,972 15% will go to the team, i.e. 6,886,796 tokens; 5% to advisers and experts, i.e. 2,295,599 tokens; 2% for the bounty 918,239 tokens; 3% for contests 1,377,359 tokens; And the main 75%, fees from the closed pre-sale and token sale (34,433,979 tokens), will go for the development of the platform!  IVC token has been listed on the OpenLedger DEX Stock Exchange and the price there is already higher than on ITO! It also exists on EtherDelta   Soon the IVC token will appear at Coinmarketcap (we have already sent the application, waiting for confirmation). We are also negotiating with Cryptopia and HitBTC for listing of IVC token on these exchanges. ITO participants received IVC tokens back at the end of December 2017. Today, distribution of the tokens for participants of the bounty campaign ended, then there will be a distribution via airdrop for registration on the platform.  Already during the ITO, we worked on creating the platform and made the first release.  Here is the way it is:     For more information please visit demo  In the first release there is a marketplace with portfolios managed by portfolio managers, who are also traders. This is not about fast trading, but about competent balancing. Now you can subscribe to any of the existing portfolios, knowing its profitability. Just enter the amount you want to get support for, for example, $ 100 and it is ready. This portfolio will be displayed in your account. You will be notified when a trader rebalances. By clicking the last change button you can see what the trader advises you to sell and buy basing on the amount you have specified.     There is also an opportunity to create your own portfolios. The exchange rate in the portfolio is taken from the Poloniex exchange online. Pie charts clearly show the percentage of cryptocurrency in the portfolio.     We also have a mobile application, but at the moment only for android  Now we are completely soaking ourselves in the work on the platform, so in February there will be a lot of goodies for you ;-)  Follow our news on Twitter, Facebook and of course join our community on Telegram, if you want to be the first to find out about the latest news.

Body: Tokens provide access to certain services of Investy Platform, the usage of IVC tokens inside the Investy ecosystem, allows the platform to develop seamlessly, and participants of Token Sale can clearly understand the goals for which they are purchasing IVC tokens. Participants can rely on the fact that tokens are traded in the markets and therefore maintain liquidity.  Functions and benefits of IVC tokens  During the Token Sale a limited number of Investy Coins will be issued. The Investment platform will also be developed during Token sale. The Platform will receive net profit in the basic cryptoassets (BTC, ETH, LTC and other liquid cryptocurrencies), IVC will be distributed among participants and will be available on the cryptoexchange markets at market prices of an asset.  1. ACCESS. Any trader or fund using the platform for trusted management is required to maintain 5% of all managed investments in IVC on the wallet. For example, a trader or a fund is planning to take into trust $1 million of assets via the Investy platform. In this case, the trader must deposit at least $50,000 in the IVC wallet, which represents 5% of the entire trusted management value; The value of assets in the traders's portfolio fluctuates over time as the value of market assets also fluctuates, according to the transaction volume of incoming and outgoing funds from other investors. At the same time, IVC tokens shall be constantly present at all times on the wallet of any trader of the platform, representing at least 5% of the traders's managed investments valuation. This principle ensures that all operational assets of the platform can be used. In case that IVC share on a wallet drops below 5%, the trader will reject investments until the IVC share again is equal to its 5% threshold or exceeds it.  2. DISCOUNT. The token holders will receive reduced commissions, the more IVC tokens are on the wallet, the lower the commission is. Imagine that you are investing $ 10,000 in management, and you double that amount for a month. At the base platform commission of 5%, an investor shall pay $ 500 of commission. But if you have our tokens on your wallet, for example, for $ 5000, the commission will be $ 250-300. If you no longer want to use the platform, you can simply sell the tokens.  3. SUBSCRIPTION. Tokens will be used as subscriptions to platform services, so, if you want to use functionality of a demo account or trading robot testing, just keep a certain number of tokens on your wallet. After you no longer need any platform services, you can just sell IVC on the exchange. Thus, the IVC token combines two functions: first, it is a product token, because it will be used as an advance payment for subscribing to the platform services after its release. Second, IVC is a discount token, because the IVC holders will receive discounts and reduced commissions depending on the number of IVC on their digital wallets.  The model advantages  The economic model of the token used by Investy allows ensuring a stable growth of the token value on the whole life cycle of IVC. From the end of Token Sale and listing on stock exchanges to next stage's of platform evolution. After Token Sale, a beta version of the Investy platform will be available, which includes a wide range of services. Since at this stage the platform will not be profitable, the growth of the token price will be provided by demand for it among those wishing to use the services of the platform. IVC token demand reflects the level of platform development, as well as the dynamics of the number actual ecosystem token users. IVC token manipulations are complex. On the one hand, managers and traders are interested in lower IVC price, which allows them to take advantage of the platform's functionality at a lower price. One the other hand, undervaluation is counterproductive, because a lower valuation limits the amount of assets available for management.

All operations are conducted through an expert system, in the development of which our team has large experience and this differs us very much from all competitors. We really care about the safety of our clients' funds.
